comment: 教育學院、營養科學學位學程、音樂系、表演藝術學士學位學程、企管系、東亞系、華語系、競技系一年級(能力分班)
restrict: ◎第一階段需人工加選◎第二階段需人工加選◎加退選階段需人工加選
description: 共同科英文（一）課程為一學年課程，每學期兩學分，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此目標，本課程要求教師盡量用英語上課，努力營造一個豐富的英語環境，讓學生不但有充分機會以英語參與課堂活動，且樂於使用英語與同學及老師溝通。
goals: 增進學生英語溝通表達能力
透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神
透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野
透過課堂討論培養批判精神
提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣
syllabus:
**English I for Non-English Majors**

Fall 2019

COURSE DESCRIPTION

Thiscourse aims to develop student’s English proficiency regarding all fourlanguage skills. Students are expected to increase their reading and writingliteracy along with listening comprehension and communication competencethrough a variety of in-class and out-of-class activities.

REQUIRED READINGS

The instructor will assign severalreadings each week. The students can choose one book from the assigned readingsbased on their interests and proficiency levels.

REQUIREMENTS & RULES

1.      Youwill be asked to work in pairs and in groups. It is very important to be aresponsible and supportive partner.

2.      Attendanceis important and participation is expected. A notification of absence form hasto be submitted online (學生請假系統). It is also the students’ own responsibility to catch up with theclass after their absence.

3.      Pleasemake sure that you have your Moodle account and check both the course site andyour email regularly. All the journals have to be uploaded to Moodle by eachdeadline. Not receiving a notice is not an excuse for absence or latesubmission.

MulticulturalFAir (GROUP PROJECT)

l  Presenters(3-4 people in one group)

Before the fair, you have to …

(1)    decide thetopic of your fair and the culture you want to introduce

(2)    find anarticle that introduces related topics (less than 200 words),

(3)    design ahandout/flyer based on the article.

During the fair, you have to divide the group into twopairs.

When it’s your turn to introduce the culture, greet, explainand give out the flyers.

When it’s your turn to travel and explore, listen, askquestions, and collect the flyers.

After the fair, you have to…

(1)    pick twoflyers to read, and

(2)    share yourthoughts in class

l  More details will be announced inclass.
